item.title: Release 0.1.0
item.description: We are excited to announce the release of version 0.1.0!
item.content:encoded:
We are excited to announce the release of version 0.1.0!

Features​

  • Enable logging in LVGL configuration, update build version, and enhance ADC task creation error handling
  • Update heater and pump settings, enhance configuration schema, and refactor related components
  • Enhance heater settings and add settings menu functionality
  • Implement temperature display widget
  • Add ADC driver and temperature sensor classes
  • Enhance LVGL integration and add logging functionality
  • Add fan control functionality with configurable temperature curves

Bug Fixes​

  • Remove redundant note about version bumps in git commit guidelines
  • Add 'pid-calibration' to the sidebar for improved documentation navigation
  • Clarify overshoot description in PID calibration guide
  • Change publish branch from main to master in documentation workflow
  • Fix various bugs with screen logic and ADC driver crashes
  • Fix empty deprecated tag causing Doxygen plugin crash
  • Fix msgbox creation and API compatibility with LVGL 9.4

Documentation​

  • Release v0.1.0 with complete documentation versioning
  • Add Docusaurus documentation site with versioned releases
  • Add comprehensive architecture documentation with diagrams
  • Add PID calibration guide with tuning methodology
  • Add auto-tuning guide for automatic PID parameter discovery
  • Add contributing guidelines and versioning strategy
  • Add API reference auto-generated from Doxygen comments

Controllers & Drivers​

  • Add HeaterController with PID temperature control and state machine
  • Add PumpController for flux management
  • Add ADC driver with FreeRTOS mutex protection and DMA support
  • Add temperature sensor interface with multi-point calibration
  • Add encoder input handling and temperature setpoint adjustment
  • Add motion sensor for iron detection
  • Add fan controller with configurable speed curves

UI & Settings​

  • Add temperature display widget with real-time updates
  • Implement settings menu with persistent LittleFS storage
  • Add temperature calibration wizard (multi-step process)
  • Add PID tuning interface with real-time feedback
  • Add settings menu functionality with subpages
  • Add lv_settings_numeric widget with floating-point support
  • Add lv_settings_select widget with observer binding

Infrastructure​

  • Add Doxygen integration for API documentation generation
  • Add GitHub Pages documentation workflow
  • Add automated sidebar generation for documentation
  • Add event callback system to HeaterController
  • Add PID auto-tuner and soft landing features
  • Enhance LVGL integration with proper memory management
  • Refactor error handling API (lv_error_*)

Chores​

  • Remove pre-commit hook and update documentation
  • Remove LVGL subproject reference from repository
  • Update .gitignore to ensure lvgl library folder is ignored
  • Remove unused color format setting
  • Update version to 0.1.0

Thank you to all contributors!

Full Changelog

See commits between releases for details.

item.title: Welcome to Desoldering Station Docs
item.description: This is the official documentation site for the Desoldering Station Firmware project.
item.content:encoded:
This is the official documentation site for the Desoldering Station Firmware project.

Here you'll find:

  • Architecture overview - System design and data flow
  • Driver documentation - ADC, PWM, PID, temperature sensors
  • Controller guides - Heater and pump management
  • GUI documentation - LVGL interface components
  • API reference - Function and class documentation

Getting Started​

Check out the Introduction to get started with the firmware.

Source Code​

The firmware source code is available on GitHub.
